mapper.select: select * from book order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into cart(customer_id, book_id, quantity) values(#{customer_id},#{book_id}, 1)
mapper.select: select * from cart where customer_id=#{customer_id} and book_id=#{book_id}

select c.id, c.customer_id, c.book_id, c.quantity,c.cart_date, b.title,b.price,b.author,b.page, (c.quantity*b.price) amount from cart c inner join book b on c.book_id=b.id where c.customer_id=#{customerId}
select sum(c.quantity*b.price) totalamount from cart c inner join book b on c.book_id=b.id where c.customer_id=#{customerId}
